name: Green Rogue presents - Clicky Carver!
description:
V2.1 Clicky Carver!

Click and carve to your hearts content in this brand new, incremental game!

It's now an .exe, sorry about the bad file type!

Patch notes:

Tweaked "Extra hand" to add one extra point per click

Increased "Extra hand" price increase from +20 to +50 per purchase
